components.name: eucanetd
components.description: Used to track component level items associated with Edge.

fields.description:
Opening this to track/debug for 4.2. 
The same test which was passing a few months ago for 4.1 is now failing for 4.2. I've verified that using the private ip(s) of the VMs works. I've also tested from multiple sources (machines in the DC, other VMs, my laptop, etc) and the behavior is the same regardless of the source. Using tcpdump on the node and VM(s), it appears that the node is responding to the sctp init packets with an abort, and packets are not seen at the VM. 
Thanks, 
-M

In [107]: 

{code}
fields.summary: Unable to pass SCTP traffic over VM's nat'd interface

comments.body:
Looks like the previous test and test tools were incorrectly setting the SCTP init packet's verification tag to a non-zero value. This now causes an abort by iptables module. 
Fixed one of the tools to send with a value of '0' and this appears to be working. 
Thanks,
-M
